TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 标识某个配置文件属性是否可由匿名用户设置或访问。

span.span: Identifies whether a profile property can be set or accessed for an anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于确定是否可访问的自定义配置文件实现的属性，如果用户是匿名用户。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 有关启用匿名身份验证的信息，请参阅提供的文档[anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the documentation provided for the [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果没有指定不允许使用配置文件属性，配置文件属性的匿名访问。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access of the profile property is not allowed. 实现的自定义配置文件是一个类，继承自抽象类，并定义中未指定的用户配置文件的属性[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 可以使用的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中指定自定义用户配置文件类型`inherits`的属性[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素，如以下示例所示。You can specify a custom user-profile type in the application's Web.config file with the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element as shown in the following example. ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义继承的类创建自定义配置文件。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the to create a custom profile. 中指定的自定义配置文件类型`inherits`的属性[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的配置元素。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例，并指定是否允许匿名访问关联的配置文件属性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies whether to allow anonymous access to the associated profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于确定是否可访问的自定义配置文件实现的属性，如果用户是匿名用户。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 有关启用匿名身份验证的信息，请参阅[anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果没有指定不允许使用配置文件属性，对配置文件属性的匿名访问。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access to the profile property is not allowed. 实现的自定义配置文件是一个类，继承自抽象类，并定义中未指定的用户配置文件的属性[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例定义继承的类类，以创建自定义配置文件。The following example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 中指定的自定义配置文件类型`inherits`的属性[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的配置元素。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. 指定自定义配置文件实现的配置文件的示例，请参阅类概述。For an example of a configuration file that specifies a custom profile implementation, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]
